definition: to rob/to plunder/to seize by force/to coerce/calamity/abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]
to take over by force/to rob/to plunder/to brush over/to skim/to sweep

sentences.english: May the creditor seize all his belongings and strangers plunder the fruits of his toil.
sentences.chinese: 使債主搜刮他所有的家產，使外人劫掠他勞力的所賺。

sentences.english: What nation hath not inherited her kingdom, and gotten of her spoils?
sentences.chinese: 那一個民族沒有佔領過這國土，沒有來劫掠分贓？

sentences.english: When the Empire discovered Endor, the Marauders captured the Imperial scouting party.
sentences.chinese: 帝國發現恩多時，劫掠者俘虜了帝國偵察隊。

sentences.english: Salak told of how the vessel traveled through the stars, capable of doing so by the "power."
sentences.chinese: 薩拉克告訴劫掠者，飛船穿越羣星靠的都是“能量”。

sentences.english: The townsmen grabbed their guns and their pitchforks and ran toward the witch.
sentences.chinese: 市民劫掠了他們的槍和他們的乾草叉並且跑了往巫婆。

sentences.english: Rock flayers are one of Outland's indigenous species.
sentences.chinese: 岩石劫掠者是外域一種土生土長的物種。

sentences.english: The Vikings raped and pillaged all along the coast.
sentences.chinese: 北歐海盜沿着海岸大肆姦淫劫掠。

sentences.english: The cameraman and sound recordist were mugged on their last day in Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 攝影師和錄音師在匹茲堡的最後一天遭到了持槍劫掠。

sentences.english: Or of course, you could loot the town and burn it all to ash…
sentences.chinese: 你也可以劫掠城鎮並把它燒成灰。

sentences.english: Brutal acts of depredation are not not uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 殘酷的劫掠行爲並非罕見。

sentences.english: Our coasts were preyed upon by Viking pirates.
sentences.chinese: 我們的海岸曾被威金族的海盜劫掠。

sentences.english: Despite being sacked and burnt by the invading Tartars in the next century.
sentences.chinese: 儘管在十三世紀裏歷經了韃靼人入侵的劫掠和燒燬。

sentences.english: The neighbors devastated the garden and pillaged the rare flowers.
sentences.chinese: 左右鄰居竊取了花園，劫掠了那些稀有的花木。

sentences.english: The precision of the new looting indicates expertise.
sentences.chinese: 新近發生的劫掠顯示出精準的專業性。

sentences.english: Those soldiers liberated the turkeys and the geese.
sentences.chinese: 那些士兵把火雞和鵝劫掠一空。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not go on panty raids into Sister of Battle monasteries.
sentences.chinese: 爾切勿加入去修道院偷修女內褲的劫掠。

definition: to massacre everyone in a captured city
